d:
Follow the adventures of one of those unsung heroes of porn, the cameraman.

Working as a crew for porn shoots isn't a "dream come true" for guys wanting to join in. It's pain and suffering; you're suppose to record what happens, not exist in the hopes of participation.

And yet here's this guy; a former union member who's down on his luck, wanting to support his family from across the seas, and stepping into territory that's akin to a predator-filled wilderness.

-=***=-

This is something I've been wanting to do for a while; taking characters from Cherry Mouse Street's "Chloe & Amber" and putting them in my constantly busy Hectoverse.

n: [Misc] [Hectotane] AVengers / "Oi. I'm (Not) Just A Cameraman." Part 00 (Unofficial Collab With Cherry Mouse Street) (Various)
